item.title: How to stop multi logging?
item.dc:creator: @ziplock ziplock
item.description:
@ziplock wrote:

Make the server check to see if a connection is “null” before it accepts it.

Read full topic

item.title: How to stop multi logging?
item.dc:creator: @asdjf asdjf
item.description:
@asdjf wrote:

for(int i = 0; i < server.playerHandler.players.length; i++){ Player p = server.playerHandler.players[i]; if (p != null && !p.disconnected && p.connectedFrom.equals(connectedFrom) && playerId != p.playerId && !connectedFrom.equals("localhost") && !checkLog("connect", connectedFrom)){ sM("Address in use!"); returnCode = 9; disconnected = true; return; } }

i tried this how ever it manages to evenutally cause my server to null every account, and when people log in or try and log in, they log in as “null” which sucks!

Read full topic
